name: Fransha Dace
text: I always enjoy going to Blaze but it‚Äôs been awhile and this is my first visit at this location. There was one worker‚Äî Billie‚Äî who made me love this place all over again. Billie was kind and patiently answered all my questions about my ‚Ä¶More

name: Jos√© Avenda√±o
text: My best choice: Meat Eater Pizza and a beer. Excellent service and friendly staff. Also, you can built your own pizza, selecting  dough/crust (gluten free option available), sauces, chesses, veggies, meats and finishes. Recommended.

name: Carol Lee
text: Order through their app! Pick up is easy and great COVID precautions.

name: Marat Zagidullin
text: They do pizzas fast but they taste outstanding, it's hard to deliver it your home if you don't plan to eat it outside. The staff is professional, peaceful, and easy-going. Good pizza chain must-visit for a tasty experience.

name: Zach Schneeberger
text: This location did it right! Chefs were super sociable and cool :) my BBQ pizza was excellent! Go get em' J-Mac

name: Jose Guzman
text: Needs better lighting inside and extra attention to details a good deep cleaning would go a long way.

name: Amber Roper
text: Build your own pizza with your choice of ANY AND I DO MEAN ANY TOPPINGS YOU WANT.... FOR $11 +TAX

name: Patrice Laroche
text: Create your own or choose from 8 pre-built pizzas.  Mine tasted great, meat eater pizza with extra banana peppers. Pizza crust was crispy. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristie Newman
text: Ordered this because I am staying nearby . Order was done quickly. The 11 inch one topping very cheap in price and great in taste. Crust pet toy crispy and toppings are flavorful. Girl at counter was very friendly at pickup. Will definitely order again

name: kiyah Murp
text: Issac was clear, professional, and when I tell you the pizza he made was freakin delicious! I'm visiting from wisconsin and I just might have to have him make me another to take home.. Thank you Issac!

name: Floreine Claybrook
text: The pizza was awesome.  Its great when they fix it just how you like it.

name: Todd Miller
text: Blaze is delicious. They stack the pizza with as many toppings as you want and they are all great.

name: Vogel Karla
text: Pesto pizza, I love you.  This was the location where I was first introduced to Escape From New York and it's deliciousness.  Now, I often find myself making excuses to go here or the Castro just to get a slice of that gooey cheese and lovely pesto on a thin and slightly crunchy crust.  Mmm...

name: Rebecca Petrone
text: Quick pizza that is delicious! Love they have things clearly marked for different dietary restrictions such as Vegan and keto.

name: Edgar Cheverez
text: Pizza was delicious and so was the staff. Especially the gentleman at the checkout, Stephen, that guy should get a raise.

name: nadine torre
text: Definitely worth the wait; If you are a pizza lover like myself, you must go here!I would definitely recommend stopping by here and trying their food.

name: Cherry Jain
text: It's an amazing, moat delicious pizza without being too heavy on stomach. Build your own pizza let's you choose a range of toppings (for me it's mostly veggies) resulting in good meal with everything in it. So, if you can't give up on pizza being health conscious, blaze pizza is something you would like to consider.

name: Sungano Ziswa
text: Great staff. They treat us like family

name: Giovanni Serrapere
text: With an array of tasty ingredients you can get creative with your pizzas here, for a reasonable price.

name: Tejas Sarma
text: Amazing Pizzas as always! Have been here a few times now and it never fails to disappoint. Nice and light pizzas for a quick snack and almost no grease at all! ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt Bero
text: Quick personal pizzas, it‚Äôs an easy decision. üçï

name: Jaleel Muhammad
text: My son loves the non dairy gluten-free pizza here.

name: Emily Ducatte
text: This pizza is always phenomenal, pretty, tastes so good, & I love how customizable everything is. The employees are always super friendly to my son and I, even when they are packed with customers right around closing time they have an ‚Ä¶More

name: Pablo Molina
text: Nice place for a quick pizza bite. All thin crust. Very pleasant staff and ambiance!

name: Tim Rabon
text: This Blaze Pizza is in a great location in downtown Chicago! The service was quick and excellent. There are great seating options both indoors and outdoors. It's also a great perk to have unlimited refills on soda. While Chicago is known ‚Ä¶More

name: Gary Vee
text: Excellent. Great toppings. Low price

name: Sandra Collins
text: Blaze pizza was a hit a the super bowl party

name: Judd Antero
text: I really love their dishes and service, good area close to my home. The employees are always nice. Will come visit again.

name: J Santiago Sr.
text: Pizza is Fire Fast and it was done real fast and I was hungry waiting for it to open since I'm used to Eastern Standard Time.  Options were good and I created my own and it tasted very good.

name: Chris Amaker
text: The pizza was tasty and the staff was friendly. I recommend this place to all. 1 meat-lovers and a beer came to $15. I thought the price was good too.

name: Ashish Agarwal
text: had a great vegetarian üçï and s'more pie.. lighting fast preparation... yummy taste...

name: Eshan Mahale
text: This is the first time us going to blaze and let me tell you it didnt disappoint one bit. The crust is as it is advertised and the pizza itself is not filling as other crusts! Would definitely recommend the pesto garlic sauce!

name: Jacqueline Pirtle
text: The food was good however we had to wait for 1 hour and 15 minutes... The service was average and one of our pizzas was served about 20 minutes after the other.

name: Chad B.
text: Pizza is good. Employees are rude

name: Lauren Covington
text: Had the bbq chicken pizza it was awesome

name: Memphis Hexman
text: Pies are made by a machine but quality is decent. One extra star for sourcing local product.

name: Saule Agdauletova
text: Build your own pizza  with no limits for just $9. Pizza is baked on fire which makes it even better. Recommend it!

name: Frances Mary
text: Staff was AMAZING on a super busy night. Dean is a pro. He keeps a smile on his face and is so kind to every customer and remembers exactly what they ordered! The line was almost out the door and there were only 3-4 employees working ‚Ä¶More

name: Saily
text: Build your own pizza concept or you can simply choose too! We built our own pizza and it was ready within no time. Dough knots were fine, could have been better. Value for money kind of place. Would definitely visit again.

name: Joanna Caro
text: How is this okay? Very disappointing

name: Bettie BAW
text: Delicious, fabulous staff

name: Gabriela Diaz
text: Visited thia location for the first time a few days ago. Lunch rush is always busy so prepare to stand in line but not for too long. The price is as good as it cna get. I chose the original crust which is thin and crispy! You get to pick ‚Ä¶More

name: shaun connelly
text: Quality here has gone down. Such a shame because I really loved this place.

name: Jason Mantzouranis
text: Tasty, fresh-made pizza. Great value too!

name: Nakia Turner
text: We ordered the veggie pizza with vegan chorizo sausage. It was our first time there. After we sat down and ate our pizza my husband immediately order another. This place is great!

name: Bradley Snyder
text: Blaze always has consistently good ingredients and pizza. It's also reasonably priced

name: Ari B. Ring
text: The best staff, so kind, engaging, and welcoming. Treat people who come back like close friends and the pizza ofcourse is always game

name: Gilbert
text: Great taste, i love blue cheese and they have it. Fair price on this neighborhood, portion is enough for an adult, great and fast customer service.

name: Shamit Khemka
text: Decent pizza. College pizza.

name: James A Lebakken
text: Greek salad was good. Pizza was undercooked. More like a soup on dough

name: Shawn Beresford
text: Great, inexpensive and quick food. They use real tomato sauce which isn't orange or watery. Good stuff

name: Jesse McKeever
text: Imagine you're eating a thin freezer pizza, like a good one, but not a great one, and its served to you by a decent staff. Boom you‚Äôre eating at Blaze.

name: Ricardo A.
text: Awesome pizza, awesome staff. Would recommend!

name: Ray
text: Pretty good thing crust pizza. The menu offers a few choices or make your own. Wait can be a little long at lunch and seating is limited. Only complaint was a lot of sauce. Worth checking out if your in the area. Prices were reasonable.

name: Jordan Ranieri
text: Great fast pizza

name: Paul Jeffries
text: Keto crust pizza was really good! Also great atmosphere. I'll be going back for sure!

name: Richard Walter
text: Great build your own pizza chain. Think Chipotle or Subway but pizza. Good pizza. Great options, full vegan friendly, and allergy friendly. Ingredients taste fresh and pizzas are quick. Good for families as well.

name: Michael Thurston
text: Love the Pizza the staff not so much.  The cashier acted annoyed she had to call me up 4 times for pizza pick up.

name: Eric Thompson
text: First time trying Blaze Pizza and we really enjoyed it! Good prices and was ready within 5-10 minutes!

name: Carocker
text: Genius! Amazing staff and best pizza ever. My favorite spot in chicago

name: Martin Kelly
text: My son introduced me to this place,, and I will definitely go again!. Great fire cooked pizza, tons of toppings!! You build your own with as many as you like for 1 price.. It's really a great value!! $10-13 for an 8 slice pizza!!!. Looking forward to my next pie..

name: Pamela Kelly
text: Delicious!  The staff was so helpful and friendly.  The pizza was lovely and crispy.  We had the Veg Out and it was fantastic. Pricing was very reasonable. Definitely going again.  Wish we had one near us in Indiana!

name: Micah Lapping-Carr
text: Pizza was really good, came out exactly how I ordered it. Staff was really chatty and friendly, made for a very pleasant experience!

name: dadrick burse
text: This place has became one of my favorite pizza places. You can customize your pizza and they make it in front of you. It is very affordable for the amount of food you get, And the staff is nice.

name: Zi K.
text: This place is a synonym of efficiency. Super streamlined order process, friendly staff, good price for lunch. Make your own pizza and get it freshly made in front of you.

name: Renee West
text: Perry good thin crust pizza made to order

name: charlie Lange
text: Went to Ontario Street Blaze 5 years ago a couple times a week when we laid over at The Inn of Chicago around the corner.  It was delicious then and the staff then, while hurried, did their jobs well.  I read some of these reviews and it ‚Ä¶More

name: Fabio Lattanzi
text: Great pizza that you can customize!

name: Phil Garnier
text: This restaurant is a bare bones decor joint with pizzas that are made fast, taste good and are reasonably priced.

name: Jacklyn Andersen
text: Quick service with options for everyone and reasonably priced. I love it.

name: Grace Burgess-Poole
text: I love love love this place. GF Dough is delicious. Vegan options! So delectable. Plus I love telling my sister I'm getting blazed with my mom!

name: Kendra McKune
text: Food was great but customer service was horrible. The employees seemed annoyed just being there

name: Michelle Black
text: I really love this idea of pizza to order AND unlimited choices of toppings...perfect. They made it even better because they added a half pizza and salad, still made to order.  The best of both worlds. Yummy! They also have an assortment of interesting drink flavors, along with regular fountain sodas.

name: Monica Switzer
text: I just want to say that Jasmine, who is one of your supervisors/managers at this location, is an outstanding young woman and a great employee. I ordered Blaze via Postmates, and Postmates cancelled on me - an hour and 10 minutes after I ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler Fulks
text: The staff was incredibly friendly! Above and beyond.

name: Jumana Ramadan
text: Full of flavor and dough is light and baked to perfection.. ingredient is good quality and fresh

name: Saad Ahmed
text: I waited for 30 minutes for my pizza and they lost track of it. The employees didn't even bother to communicate with me to try and figure out what happened. By the time I got my pizza after waiting in line an additional 15 minutes, the ‚Ä¶More

name: C0urtney McCraw
text: I ordered ahead & the gentlemen working double-checked my order to make sure it matched my receipt, which I appreciate. The staff was friendly to everyone and the service felt really good. I can‚Äôt say the atmosphere has always been that way ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Wolfrum
text: Fantastic service and a delicious pesto chicken pizza!  Yum!

name: Emily Pizzimenti
text:
Very sloppy/dirty. I have a dairy allergy and the row of ingredients was such a mess. Received attitude when I asked for a clean sauce, spinach, etc. For sure got sick because of it.
It's like a worse version of Mod Pizza.

name: Kelli Kakes
text: Friendly staff.  Helpful. Love their Signature pizzas (my 4 faves: Green Stripe, Veg Out, Red Vine, or BBQ Chicken) or love making my own.

name: Millie Rey
text: The pizza was delicious and the people working there were really nice and fun

name: jacob klein
text: I was in the mood for thin crust pizza, so I looked up blaze and walked in. I had zero expectations and was blown away!!! The staff was so kind and helped explained how the restaurant worked. They went above and beyond normal expectations ‚Ä¶More

name: Sergey Dunaev
text: Great service. Quick delivery.

name: Joey Giffee
text: They don‚Äôt seem to understand their own concept of cooking in a wood fired oven...and always serve undercooked pies that would be 5 stars if fully cooked and crispy.

name: Edgar Soto
text: Excellent pizzas at fair prices. Service is good too.

name: Hans de Rooij
text: Not deep dish but excellent traditional üçïüëç

name: Tris Lumley
text: Great pizza, friendly staff, nice to be able to tweak your pizza as it's built. Go for the spicy sauce - really good

name: Roosevelt Wilkerson
text: So

text: I think a snail could make pizza faster than this Blaze pizza.

name: Katie Taylor
text: I love Blaze Pizza! I had the Gluten free dough and goat cheese (I have Celiacs and can‚Äôt eat wheat/dairy/gluten/lactose). IT WAS AMAZING. They take extra care to always change gloves when handle the GF dough, use different tongs when ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Eaves
text: Delicious pizza and super friendly staff.  The Meat Eater was tasty. Thin crust is spot on!  Nice sidewalk dining.

name: Mali Rocketz
text: Basic concept. Decent pizza. Not a chicago style pizza, but get the self rise pizza. Theyl flat one is kinda too soft.

name: Jared King
text: Okay pizza for adults. Excellent for kids and families. I tend to keep it simple and really enjoy a basic 1-topping, red onion pizza.

name: Nicolas Lopez Cano
text: Great place! Very good price and the workers are extremely nice. Definitely would come back.

name: Jeremy Kane
text: Little slow bc of the stone oven I guess. But good food and like the interior theme they have going on.

name: COVERICK
text: We had an impromptu little bday celebration for me with my 4 yr grandson. The staff, the owner, our server were all fantastic. We sat upstairs and had the most enjoyable experience. Oh yes...the pizza....outstanding.  As were our appetizer ‚Ä¶More

text: I love Blaze Pizza you can make your pizza the way you want it.

name: Steve C

name: Eduardo de arcos
text: I work there. Of course it's good

name: Robyn Tong
text: Staff are great & friendly, pizza has never disappointed me, and I‚Äôm always full before finishing my pizza. Best fast food pizza place I know.

name: K Pederson
text: Pizza was hot with crispy crust. Great traditional sauce.

name: Sharon Watkins
text: Sadly disappointed. I didn't like their pizza or lack of cleanliness and lazy staff. I realize it was close to closing time, but all the tables were a mess. Napkin dispenser was empty as were almost all the other dispensers (lids, cups, ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Schuster
text: Cheap, fast and delicious. I was surprised by how good these little pizzas are. The BBQ chicken pizza and garlic bread combo will hit the spot!

name: Daniel Lukic
text: Great pizza, friendly staff and affordable prizes.

name: corey nunley
text: Get blazed and go to blaze it's pretty good it's basically Subway Meats pizza thin crust if you overload it with toppings it becomes hard to eat but extremely good and high-quality products good staff

name: Patricia Watkins
text: OMG! My first time eating there and the pizza's were very delicious... fresh! delicious ! the employees were wonderful  they helped you out if it is your first time there!  matter fact we went there the next day for dinner and I will go back to Blaze when I come back to Chicago!

name: Tawana Cotton
text: Quick and yet still flavorful and crispy.

name: Farayi Ziswa
text: Careful on ordering deep-dish. A large is too much for one üòÇ

text: Don't expect fancy pizzas. But if you need something easy and fast, I'll recommend it

name: Anthony Carrillo
text: It's a bit on the thin side. No deep dish here.

name: Emily Butterfield
text: Fast service and super friendly staff!

name: Andre Ramos

name: Brian Kincaid
text: The staff is great and always friendly. The pizza is tasty with fresh ingredients. Blaze is a great value for a quick meal in downtown Chicago.

name: Benjamin Lawson
text: Fast, reasonably-priced, friendly staff.

name: Keary Weaver
text: Build your own with their huge assortment of topping.  Recommend the pesto sauce

name: David Potak
text: This place was great when it first opened but the service has quickly gone down the gutter. The employees seem more interested in screwing off with each other than serving customers. Leads to the typical headaches - long wait times for ‚Ä¶More

name: Samuel Nelson
text: In the past year our family had about 25 Blaze Pizzas and it's always either hit or miss.  The quality is very uneven. Please sweep the oven for charcoal! Sometimes it's amazing, sometimes it's pathetic.  During tourist season mostly the ‚Ä¶More

name: Gretchen Stephenson
text: I loved the pizza. I was also very impressed with the service. I went at the height of lunchtime and they were packed. They must have made 30+ pizzas while I was there, but they all managed to accomplish that with a smile and upbeat attitude. I will definitely return.

name: Sherita Kelton
text: I want to give 5 because food is so good and I love the atmosphere. However at the time I was there with my 3 year peincess management and a staffer were in a huge argument over hours and duties. Both parties were very vocal and used very colorful language.

name: pablo nicholls
text: Awesome pizza, awesome price

name: Alex Warner
text: Ordered pizza for pickup and an hour after pickup time the food still wasn‚Äôt ready. I never received food had to leave because couldn‚Äôt wait any longer. There was at least a dozen people waiting for pizzas that were not ready anywhere near the requested time.

name: Karan amlani
text:
Interesting concept of making your choice of pizza.
Wonderful tasty thin crust pizza at at amazing price. Allows you to add as many toppings as you wish. ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa Woodside
text: The service is a disaster pizza cold.

name: Amber Rosalez
text: Delicious and fast pizza just the way you like it!

name: Pratiksha Lunawat
text: Great quality, and great taste. Being a vegetarian i love this place for veggie pizza. Price is bit high for the quantity they provide, but taste makes it all in level.

name: Asher Grossman
text: Wow. The food is amazing. Great vegan pizza, not that common!

name: Tedy Willian Ribeiro Lima
text: The service is terrible. I made one order thru the app on April 20th and i never received the pizza. I tried to call there 3 times during this week and they don't have solution for my case. They charged my credit card and didn't give me refund.

name: Anthony Ramirez
text: Add whatever ingredients you want all for a flat price, or get a specialty made pizza. Both of which are great, but I'd suggest making your own and experiment. I did. And I found the perfect mix of interesting and different ingredients. ‚Ä¶More

text: Damn awesome!! Best bang for the buck!

name: Lupe Dolores

name: Bryan Ballard
text: Best pizza I've ever had

name: Abdulaziz Sagar
text: Delicious pizza. I like it

name: Jason Toellner
text: I loved the pizza, but my 4 kids did not. I do NOT understand why they burned 3 pizzas when they know kids don't like burnt crust pizza. If this is normal then they should warn you first that your pizza will be burnt. They were not busy and 4 or 5 tables were dirty.

name: Mariah Oatts
text: Blaze is amazing! Tasty fresh pizza made quickly and just for you. Love the customization options

name: David Quinn
text: Great simple pizza's with gluten free option. The pizzas are fantastic however the staff can be a little hit and miss. Some are excellent and attentive and others have no interest in being there.

name: Christina Koussih
text: The pizza was mediocre. I wasn't impressed. There was little value for your money. The employees were engaged and helpful.

name: Rozita Terlixidou

text: Food was amazing! It was so delicious! Service was great! Highly recommend!

name: T√∫ Ng√¥

name: Andrew Nelson
text: Good pizza for not too much money. You're looking at about $8 for a pizza that will probably serve two people. Lots of options and a friendly staff

name: Kristen Apodaca
text: Ivy and Kee Kee and Tyrone are AMAZING. Give them a raise!! I am from Arizona and normally go to MOD but from now on I will make the drive to go to Blaze. Pinky promise!

name: Al Chiquito
text: Pizza to order: you chose your toppings and very reasonably priced. Despite the everchanging staff, they are great! If you haven't been here, they'll help you. My favorite place for pizza so far.

name: Kevin Kelly
text: Staff is super friendly and service is always super fast. Garlic knots are surprisingly good.

name: Rithikrai Sreewichai
text: Long wait

name: Srishti Jhanwar
text: Blaze pizza is fast, thin and amazing. They have half pizza, half salad at a very low cost which is amazing

name: Saeid Nasher
text:
Great pizza, custom made pizza with fresh products, everything is done in front of your eyes. Very competitive price.
Totally recommended.

name: Grieg Chapian
text: Great vegan and GF pizzas! Freshly made with ingredients you choose all for the same low price. It's really good.

name: Keonna Mercer
text: Great food friendly customer service

name: Chris B
text: Good make your own pizza shop. Great when you are out and about.

name: Michael Kiriazis
text: Pretty good value. Definitely build your own pizza and load up on premium unique toppings! If you can't decide on sauce, go half and half.

name: Dustin Goncharoff
text: Blaze Pizza offers fairly solid thin crust pizzas at a good price. The biggest attraction is the build-your-own and provides the best bang for your buck. Blaze is to pizza like Qdoba is to burritos - offering a large range of options to ‚Ä¶More

name: Max Leal-Gomez
text: Fast, friendly, tastes great. Get to watch every step of the process. Not too expensive. Customizable pizzas are awesome.

name: Fernando D'Annunzio
text: Just ask for that the guy who makes the pizza gets and you won't be disappointed

name: Chris Cody
text: Blaze is the best quick pizza place, and this one in particular does an awesome job and has really good people working at it.

name: Sarah Herndon
text: The food is good, however, the service is TERRIBLE. I just went in. Even though it's lunchtime, no one was waiting to be helped in line ahead of me and there were 5 staff I could see. Two of them were preparing dough right in front of me. ‚Ä¶More

name: Anthony Jimenez
text: You make your own pizza for a really good price that ends up tasting amazing!!

name: Alok Shah
text: I'd give them five stars for food. Fantastic build your own pizza. My only beef (pun intended) is that if you're vegetarian it's gonna suck. They don't change gloves and the meat counter is first, and you can see the meat flying onto the veggies. Yikes!!!

name: Frank C
text: What a mess. Obviously either understaffed, untrained, poorly managed, or a combination of all three. A Thursday night about 8, not particularly busy but the line is moving at a snail's pace...about 15 minutes into the line the EMT in front ‚Ä¶More

name: Mel
text: Staff were very friendly, pizza came out very quickly and it tasted really good. So good that we forgot to take a picture before we devoured it üôÉ

name: Ankit Tyagi
text: We love this place. You build your own in few minutes and served hot

name: Kendra Julion
text: Obsessed with this place. The have a gluten free option for their pizza as well as having amazing toppings to put on it. The customer service was great and I have been there at least 5 times in the past 2 weeks. Can't get enough of their pizza!!!

name: Arun Paul
text: The best pizzas

name: Kristen Wiloch
text: Very fast and delicious and reasonably priced!

name: Samuel Herenton
text: I had a great experience at Blaze Pizza and Kiana made it better. She gave great hospitality and I will definitely be back !

name: Tiffany Scott
text: Love this place!  It's better than Pizza Studio. Literally have tried all the toppings!

name: Catriona Smith
text: THE STAFF WERE SO DAMN FRIENDLY! Felt completely at home would recommend to a friend any day of the week. Pizza was real good too

name: Ananya R.
text: Even in rush hour the service was great. Love blaze!

name: Brock McBride
text: I was given the best service from a server named Dion. He made it an easy process getting the pizza I‚Äôve been craving!

name: Braden
text: I prefer Mod Pizza but this is the best cheap  option in the Streeterville area

name: Tim Yocum
text: It's fast food pizza but really isn't too bad at all. I went with one of the pre designed pizzas and wasn't disappointed. Wait time was just a few minutes, and it tasted like a decent fresh made pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: A A

name: Hari Iyer

name: MIKE BURGESS

text: Great pizza, good service, but could use more seating.

name: Nutan Shah

name: Alex Simon
text: Serviceable lunch spot if you're in the area.  Build your own pizza concept.  I'm sure I'll go again with coworkers but really nothing special.

name: Julia Morales
text:
Blaze Pizza is good. I've always liked it.

But this specific location is a hot mess. There's so much CROSS-CONTAMINATION!! ‚Ä¶More

text: The pizza is good, and the individual pizzas come really fast. But the dessert Smores are kind of bland.

name: Tanya Frizell

name: John Brady
text: Great staff, pizza was delicious! Will come again!

name: LaShante Griffin
text: It's great for everyone to be able to get their pizza with whatever they want on it. There are so many options to choose from

name: Vincent H
text: Great place. The pizza are really good for the price. The staff is always really nice.

name: Diana Paul
text: Great concept, excellent quality and taste. However they could iron out the process especially at rush time like accommodate for extra pizza building stations to speed up the line up.

text: Decent location.  Can be a little too busy at times and often under staffed

text: Burned pizza.... I liked in other places, but here they don't know what they have to do, what needs to be done....
